original_title: Trilog: Fisheries, The Rhyme, The Old
overview: "Yesterday I took another look at the three film prints I own by Gary Doberman, FISHERIES, THE RHYME and THE MOIETIES and satisfied myself that, yes, the last several years his work has been THE most persistent influence on my films ...." - Stan Brakhage, Brakhage Scrapbook
title: Trilog: Fisheries, The Rhyme, The Old
